3 Rows of data coming from the Oracle select statment: column data: "data", "itemCount" {"STUDENTPIDM":1,"STUDENTID":111,"STUDENTNAME":"Presley, Elvis","AIDYEAR":"2425","CATEGORY":"Deceased","CATEGORIES":null,"COMMENTS":"Wish he was still here"}, 3 {"STUDENTPIDM":2,"STUDENTID":222,"STUDENTNAME":"Monroe, Mariln","AIDYEAR":"2324","CATEGORY":"Deceased","CATEGORIES":null,"COMMENTS":"Really miss her."}, 3 {"STUDENTPIDM":3,"STUDENTID":333,"STUDENTNAME":"Dean, James","AIDYEAR":"2425","CATEGORY":"Deceased","CATEGORIES":null,"COMMENTS":"Cool Actor"}, 3 These three rows coming from the Oracle select statement would look like this after being fetched. Don't have an example of the itemCount but I would assume just "3" after the "data" column. 0 Object {"STUDENTPIDM":1,"STUDENTID":111,"STUDENTNAME":"Presley, Elvis","AIDYEAR":"2425","CATEGORY":"Deceased","CATEGORIES":null,"COMMENTS":"Wish he was still here"} 1 Object {"STUDENTPIDM":2,"STUDENTID":222,"STUDENTNAME":"Monroe, Mariln","AIDYEAR":"2324","CATEGORY":"Deceased","CATEGORIES":null,"COMMENTS":"Really miss her."} 2 Object {"STUDENTPIDM":3,"STUDENTID":333,"STUDENTNAME":"Dean, James","AIDYEAR":"2425","CATEGORY":"Deceased","CATEGORIES":null,"COMMENTS":"Cool Actor"} The three rows above need to be converted to the format below within the Fetch statement: { data: [ { ..row 1 of "data"...}, { ..row 2 of "data"..}, { ..row 3 of "data"..} ...], itemsCount: n }
